name: unfold
description: **unFold** is a Firefox extension for foldable Android devices, designed to automatically switch websites between their mobile and desktop layouts as you fold and unfold your screen.

scripts.clean: node -e "require('fs').rmSync('dist', { recursive: true, force: true }); require('fs').rmSync('dist_zip', { recursive: true, force: true });"
scripts.build: npm run clean && node scripts/update-manifest.js && vite build
scripts.build:firefox: npm run build && web-ext build --source-dir dist --artifacts-dir dist_zip --filename unfold-firefox-{version}.xpi --overwrite-dest
